title: How would this setup run LOL?
body:
Im looking to buy a new computer since my laptop will power off sometimes due to internal issues.  Someone I know will sell me their cpu for 300$. Also I do not plan to do much with the laptop except for league and casual web browsin.  These are the specs~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A
Dell Inspiron 3650
1 TB Hard Drive
Intel Core i3-6100 CPU @3.70 GHZ
8GB Ram
64 Bit Operating System X 64 Based Processor

replies.body: I'd say it should run pretty fine, but be sure to double check your specs against the [**minimum specs guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654) when checking things like this.

since i'm an expert in potatoes and toasters i would say that it will run lol at the highest quality and performance , you know league doesn't require a lot its just a mix of colors lmao :D don't worry you will have to play with +60 fps even without gpu , btw whats your gpu ?
